name: glorious-frontend
description: Frontend application foundation featuring TypeScript, React, and Sass.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && run-p build-scripts build-styles && echo Done production build.
scripts.build-debug: rimraf dist && run-p build-scripts-debug build-styles && echo Done debug build.
scripts.build-scripts: tsc && browserify dist/main.js -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify > dist/main.bundle.uncompressed.js && uglifyjs -cm < dist/main.bundle.uncompressed.js > dist/main.bundle.js
scripts.test: echo Not test driven, lol && exit 0
